content: Hi everyone! I moved my rust directory from old/rust to new/rust but now x.py fails with failed to execute command: "old/rust/build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/bin/rustc" "--target" "x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" "--print" "target-libdir". Does anybody have an idea why it would still use the old path?
(Use ./x.py clean to remove the build cache.)
(Or rm -rf build/ but that will remove LLVM's build as well.)
